column1: send a gift thelma lorene bennett. oct 15
column5: a former resident of miami passed away in crystal river
column6: florida. services are pending and have been placed in the care of brown-winters funeral home and cremation service of miami. friends and family may send the family notes of encouragement by viewing mrs. bennett's tribute page at www. brown-winters. com. cemetery details. grand army of the republic2801 north main street. miami
